price: Zar i vi ne biste, kad biste se vlasti dočepali, nered na Zemlji činili i rodbinske veze kidali!
arabic: فَهَلۡ عَسَيۡتُمۡ إِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ أَن تُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَتُقَطِّعُوٓاْ أَرۡحَامَكُمۡ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fahal ʿasaytum in tawallaytum an tuf'sidū fī al-arḍi watuqaṭṭiʿū arḥāmakum
